product_overview: HC Beacon is a psychology-based, gamified online learning platform that integrates habit formation, skill tracking, and community engagement to create an immersive educational experience. Users progress through a 51-level system across four mastery schools by completing courses, mastering habits, and participating in community activities.
core_goals: Provide an engaging gamified learning experience using XP progression and level systems.
Support habit formation and mastery through dedicated tools like habit tracking, toolbox items, and calendar integration.
Enable comprehensive skill tracking across multiple cognitive, creative, and social domains.
Ensure seamless user authentication with role-based access control and subscription management.
Foster a vibrant learning community with social feeds, challenges, and leaderboards.
Offer a responsive, mobile-first UI with beautiful glassmorphism design.
Support teachers to create courses and manage educational content effectively.
key_features: Authentication & User Management with email/password, profile avatars, and role management for Free, Student, Teacher, and Admin roles.
Main Dashboard featuring widgets for XP progress, daily rituals, coherence, achievements, current lessons, constellation navigator, teacher feed, and quick actions.
Comprehensive Course System including catalog browsing, detailed course pages, video lesson player, progress tracking, and course creation by teachers.
Mastery Tools comprising habit tracking with streaks, toolbox items management, and calendar integration for habit visualization.
Skills System tracking multiple skills in categories such as cognitive, creative, discipline, and social with radar chart visualizations.
Achievements System displaying badges and tracking user accomplishments.
Community & Social Features including social feed, posts, comments, user interactions, challenges, and leaderboards.
Subscription & Pricing integration via Stripe with secure payment processing, role updates, and subscription management.
Profile Management for settings, progress visualization, and avatar customization.
Mobile-First Responsive Design and UI Components leveraging shadcn/ui and Radix UI with glassmorphism styling.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in using email and password authentication and gains role-based access to the platform.
User lands on the Dashboard to view their XP progress, daily rituals, mastery stats, achievements, current lessons, and community updates.
User browses and enrolls in courses via the Course Catalog, watches video lessons, and tracks learning progress.
User manages daily habits, uses toolbox items, and marks completions via calendar to advance their mastery levels.
Teacher users create and manage course content through the Course Creation interface.
Users engage in the community by posting on social feeds, commenting, liking, and joining challenges.
Users manage their profile settings, update avatars, and review progress through the Profile section.
Users subscribe or manage subscriptions through Stripe integration for premium features and role upgrades.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and login with appropriate role-based access.
Accurate tracking and visual display of XP progression and level status.
Correct functionality of habit tracking, toolbox usage, and calendar habit completion.
Course catalog and player work seamlessly with progress saving and playback.
Teacher course creation workflows operate without errors and save new content appropriately.
Community features including post creation, comments, likes, and leaderboards function correctly.
Subscription payments are processed successfully through Stripe with role updates reflected in the system.
UI responsiveness and mobile compatibility meet design standards including touch target sizes and safe area handling.
Achievement badges and progress display accurately update based on user activity.
Error handling and loading states present gracefully with no blocking bugs.
